details.script_description: This script runs a molecular dynamics simulation using GROMACS. It uses 64 MPI processes and 1 thread per process. The simulation is run for 5 hours with a memory limit of 10GB. The script is submitted to the 'short_cpuQ' queue. The output is written to 'logs/wt2_rep0_out' and errors are written to 'logs/wt2_rep0_err'.
